jobTitle: Software Engineers: Big Data, Hadoop, Data Science
jobDescription: Description: You will be applying Big Data, Data Analytics and Machine Learning techniques over a multi hundred TB data store developing products that make the world a safer place.  The work is around big data, analytics, machine learning, concurrency, scaling, real-time stream processing, distributed systems, caching, and more. The tech stack is the Hadoop ecosystem including Storm, Pig, Spark, Hive, Java, Python etc.  What you will be doing:  Applying Big Data, Data Mining, and Machine Learning techniques over a multi-hundred TB datastore  Solving end-to-end problems by writing requirements, designing and developing software  Researching and implementing new technologies to enhance the efficacy of our products  Looking at projects holistically and understanding the impact of changes end to end.  Working in a creative dynamic environment, with other developers and partners in agile environment.  Your background:  Strong proficiency in C++, or Java, and SQL, and/or Perl/Python  Experience with Hadoop, HiveQL, MapReduce, Hbase  Proficiency with build, test, and deployment of automation systems  Knowledge of security or cloud/serving technology a plus  Bachelors Degree or above in Computer Science or equivalent experience
